text: So, Rob, thanks for joining us here today.

it's such a common example

but it was use the

So we wanted to make sure

So that was where we really thought that,

"Hey, why don't we actually
just integrate this nicely

AI trip planner so that someone could book
right in the app," versus,

"Okay, you've had this great

now we've told you go use the,

So that was something we wanted to have
that customer experience go
all the way through to a booking.

And, and I think like
there, there's two kind

One is the user interface.
It's a new way of consuming

and interacting with
technology and information.

rich data that you have.

What are your thoughts on that?
- Yeah, no doubt.

PII or personally identifiable information
